emailBodyPostDemographic:
Dear %s,

We appreciate your acceptance of our terms and conditions (smartdietplanner.com/terms) and registering with our app Smart Diet planner, a first of its kind solution and a revolutionary way to plan your meals for weight management and lifestyle issues like acidity, BP, Diabetes and Thyroid.

No more Calories Counting now, like other apps , as 99percentage people ultimately give it up.

This solution has been created with the team of nutritionists along with digital software professionals. We use the power of Nutrition , circadian rhythm and Artificial intelligence to create the meal plan recommendations based on following :

     1. Your weight, height and gender
     2. Your lifestyle – how much active you are, at what time
         you wake and what time you prefer to eat
     3. Your life style diseases if any
     4. Your food choices
     5. Calories recommended for you
     6. Nutrients recommended for you
     7. circadian rhythm recommendations
     8. Principles of Nutrition

We provide you free meal plan along with free trackers for Fasting, water , activities and weight loss progress. We request you to activate the premium plan of Smart diet planner so as to unlock the actual power of this solution. With premium plan, you can :

    1. Update the recommend meal plan with your own food
        choices and keep a check on:
        - the calories budget
        - recommended nutrients
        - circadian rhythm recommendations

    2. Refresh food item in the meal plan with more choices
    3. Can know the science behind key mantras and track your
        progress against each
    4. Can view the food item details , its nutrient values and the
        recipe.

All this you can do it for as low as Rs 100 to 300 per month depending on the plan which you will choose. This is a fraction of the cost which you will pay to a dietitian. This is less than cost of a McDonalds Burger or a coffee at your favourite restaurant. These are our introductory prices at 50percentage discount.

Best part is that it is totally risk free . If you are NOT satisfied, you can cancel subscription with in 24 hrs and get 100percentage refund. So go ahead and activate the premium plan.

In case of any issue or any query drop us email at admin@smartdietplanner.com. Access the app from smartdietplanner.com/app


Regards-
Dr Megha and Smart diet planner team
